website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few durability concerns, this canopy has some nice features, including its low price point.
pros: Has an attractive design with window panels
Comes in white which is perfect for weddings
Sidewalls are removable for events in warm weather when you need more ventilation
Price is appropriate for wedding planning on a budget
cons: Doesn't hold up well in very windy or rainy conditions

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Does the job. Lasted and prob get one or two uses out of it. I saw reviews where it said don’t leave up in rain. Tried to tell my husband but he wasn’t listening and of course it broke and bent but was able to repair for the event. If you are looking for a heavy duty tent this ain’t it! But for a dry weather event, it will work.
customer_reviews.author: MrsNewBeautie

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very good deal esp for the price! We left it up for a few days with no problems but weather was good. Fairly easy to put up and take down as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, good for one use, only 3 sides
customer_reviews.text: Great for a one time use below 5mph winds. "4 panels" only cover 3 sides, one pole was missing a securing clip, on day with mild winds, the poles were done, the material ripped
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This ain't it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this canopy lasted for most of the event I needed it for but that's not saying much. It was a windy day and the thing blew over so I purchased more things to secure it down. It held up but it leaned the entire event it's very cheaply mad it almost feel like a raincoat. It's not something we will be using again.
customer_reviews.author: Shante_you_stay

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Some of the polls did not fit well into each other. A couple were already bent a bit. The steaks that came with it bent easily and caused the slightest wind to Unlatch and cause the tent To bend over. We had to use some duct tape to hold it together and also purchase a tarp
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Vaniderstine

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as described
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Poles were easily bent. Came apart with strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: I seriously looked around read reviews for an entire day trying to find a tent. This was the worst purchase I have ever had on amazon. Flimsy doesn’t even begin to describe it. We had it properly weighted down and staked, and it still got completely destroyed within 4 hours. The weather was beautiful and sunny with occasional winds. Nothing extreme or inclimate. I’m so disappointed. A complete waste of my hard earned money. Don’t believe the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Abbe Harshbarger

customer_reviews.title: Great value, worked well with a little help.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a shelter (rain was forecast ) for a socially distant alternative graduation celebration for 4 people as guest drove by. The tent arrived on time, was easy to assemble and with the help of a center 2x4 and some weights withstood a downpour and 15 mph winds. Good deal all around!
customer_reviews.author: kellyskid

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst purchases I’ve made! I bought this for Memorial Day weekend and had maybe 10 mph winds with rain and the entire canopy collapsed and bars that were supposed to hold it were bent and broken. I had to throw it out 3 hours after assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: melody mercado

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This tent was so bad! The stands were horrible. It is not sturdy at all. It’s a waste to buy this tent. I needed the tent for a party I was having and put it up and it was messing a base foot. Do not buy this if you want a good quality tent
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Make sure wind is not blowing when setting it up
customer_reviews.text: The wind took it like a sail and blew it up over my roof and bent the smaller tubes and I cannot use it waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Studiness
customer_reviews.text: This is a good canopy, material is okay. Easy to set up and provides good shade.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Outsunny Large 10' x 20' Gazebo Canopy Party Tent with 4 Removable Window Side Walls,Wedding, Picnic Outdoor Events-White
feature_bullets: ✅VERSATILE TENT: Our new party tent is ideal for many different events, such as parties, weddings, and other special occasions.

✅WEATHER-FIGHTING: The polyethylene fabric cover on this wedding tent prevents types of weather from getting from you, from UV rays to raindrops. There are 4 ropes and 10 ground pegs enclosed for strengthening stability of the tent.
✅STURDY CONSTRUCTION: The frame on this canopy tent is made of heavy-duty painted steel for pure stability. Its been treated too, so it's lightweight and rust-fighting for a long time to come.
✅EXCELLENT SIDEWALLS: Removable sidewalls offer you great ventilation on hot days, which is perfect for parties. They feature a super easy hook and loop system for quick setup and removal.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars33 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
